tha-ap79:0.3_0: He then went to the streets and song;
tha-ap79:1.2_0: the world is freed from the world.
tha-ap79:1.4_0: is due to the armpit of gems.
tha-ap79:2.3_0: I’ve been given to the five pigs,
tha-ap79:2.4_0: for the purpose of sewing robes.
tha-ap79:4.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
tha-ap79:4.2_0: rebirth into all states of existence is eradicated,
tha-ap79:4.4_0: to the teaching of the Buddha.
tha-ap79:6.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap79:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable S needle case.
tha-ap79:8.1_0: a pile of senior monks, who was a seventh camel’s foot.
